abstract: “Fringe,” Fox’s new science fiction series from producer J.J. Abrams, garnered winning ratings on Tuesday– but not by much.
snippet: “Fringe,” Fox’s new science fiction series from producer J.J. Abrams, garnered winning ratings on Tuesday– but not by much.
lead_paragraph: “Fringe,” Fox’s new science fiction series from producer J.J. Abrams, garnered winning ratings on Tuesday– but not by much. “Fringe” edged past both ABC’s game show “Wipeout” and NBC’s reality show “America’s Got Talent” to lead the night among adults 18 to 49, but the new Fox drama nonetheless trailed in total viewers with a modest audience of 9 million viewers from 8 to 9:30 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Tuesday Ratings: Not an Easy Win for ‘Fringe’
